SEARCH
Package com.nebulous.chat.utils

Class ChatConstants

java.lang.Object
com.nebulous.chat.utils.ChatConstants
public class ChatConstants extends Object
A utility class that holds constant values used throughout the chat application. These constants define configuration parameters, default values, and common messages shared between the client and server.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DEFAULT_USER_NAME
    The default username assigned to a client if none is provided.
    static final String
    EXIT_COMMAND
    The command a client or server can use to exit the chat application.
    static final int
    PORT
    The port number on which the server and client use for connections.
    static final String
    SERVER_FULL_MESSAGE
    A message sent by the server to notify a client that the server is full and cannot accept new connections.
    static final String
    SERVER_SHUTDOWN_MESSAGE
    A message sent by the server to notify clients that the server is shutting down.
    static final int
    THREAD_POOL_SIZE
    The maximum number of threads in the server's thread pool.

    • THREAD_POOL_SIZE

      public static final int THREAD_POOL_SIZE
      The maximum number of threads in the server's thread pool. This value determines the maximum number of concurrent client connections the server can handle.
